overview:
Rob is the Founder and CEO of CustomWare. He founded CustomWare in 2001 in Sydney and has since grown it with offices in Malaysia and Palo Alto along with Sydney, Australia.

He has been listed 3 times as one of Australiaâ€™s top 30 entrepreneurs under 30 years of age and in 2009 was recognised with a regional â€˜Entrepreneur of the Yearâ€™ award for services by Ernst & Young and is the Australian Chair for the Global Student Entrepreneur Awards - an annual competition encouraging student entrepreneurs around the world. He represented Australia at the G20 Summit for Youth Entrepreneurship in Toronto 2010.

Rob has been guest lecturing for a Masters course on Systems Integration at the University of Technology, Sydney since 2000. He has also co-authored, technically edited and contributed to several books including â€˜Enterprise Java Beans 2.1â€™ and â€˜Thinking in Javaâ€™ .
